gt_text: 新春送礼 分享福气的时节。精选礼盒 ¥8.88 起  全龄送礼首选  免费礼品包装服务
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Top-center Chinese title “新春送礼”
*   Golden calligraphy for title
*   Red lanterns framing title
*   Cloud motifs framing title
*   Small red text “分享福气的时节。” above title
*   Gold-bordered ribbon beneath title
*   Text “精选礼盒 ¥8.88 起” on ribbon
*   Family reunion dinner table
*   Gift boxes on table
*   Red envelopes on table
*   Oranges on table
*   Apples on table
*   Faint fireworks in sky
*   Traditional courtyard background
*   Brand logo (lower right)
*   Text “全龄送礼首选,” (brand area)
*   Text “免费礼品包装服务,” (brand area)
*   Decorative seal QR code (brand area)
